OMG hurka79 what's wrong with you?

Seriously, get a life.

And Musy, great upload.

game extracts and runs, no issues.

Worth noting, the second i jumped into take a drive, i couldn't move, so i went into the controls and dear god musy, you have the most ridiculous key setup i've ever seen. After resetting that to something a normal human would use i went back in game.

Dear god, the only thing i could think was "this is a half ass version of GTA" and dear goodness it was. 

After 20 minutes of playing, i decided i'm not even going to do the campaign, i just straight-out deleted it.



tl;dr: Torrent works fine, just reset the controls to your liking. Game itself sucks ass.
This may be a half-ass version of GTA:SA, but the police lights look a lot better than the pile of crap particle system...
